verses.verse: Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> seeing we have <S%G2192><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> ministry, <S%G1248><s%> as we have <S%G2192><s%> received <S%G1653><s%> mercy, <S%G1653><s%> we faint <S%G1573><s%> not;

But have renounced <S%G550><s%> the hidden <S%G2927><s%> things of dishonesty, <S%G152><s%> not walking <S%G4043><s%> in craftiness, <S%G3834><s%> nor <S%G3366><s%> handling <S%G1389><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> deceitfully; <S%G1389><s%> but by manifestation <S%G5321><s%> of the truth <S%G225><s%> commending <S%G4921><s%> ourselves <S%G1438><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> man's <S%G444><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
But if <S%G1499><s%> our gospel <S%G2098><s%> be hid, <S%G2572><s%> it is hid <S%G2572><s%> to them that are lost: <S%G622><s%>

In whom <S%G3739><s%> the god <S%G2316><s%> of this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G165><s%> has blinded <S%G5186><s%> the minds <S%G3540><s%> of them which believe <S%G571><s%> not, lest <S%G1519><s%> the light <S%G5462><s%> of the glorious <S%G1391><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is the image <S%G1504><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> should shine <S%G826><s%> to them.

For we preach <S%G2784><s%> not ourselves, <S%G1438><s%> but Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> the Lord; <S%G2962><s%> and ourselves <S%G1438><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> for Jesus' <S%G2424><s%> sake.

For God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> commanded <S%G2036><s%> the light <S%G5457><s%> to shine <S%G2989><s%> out of darkness, <S%G4655><s%> has shined <S%G2989><s%> in our hearts, <S%G2588><s%> to give the light <S%G5462><s%> of the knowledge <S%G1108><s%> of the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in the face <S%G4383><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

But we have <S%G2192><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> in earthen <S%G3749><s%> vessels, <S%G4632><s%> that the excellency <S%G5236><s%> of the power <S%G1411><s%> may be of God, <S%G2316><s%> and not of us.
We are troubled <S%G2346><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3956><s%> side, yet <S%G235><s%> not distressed; <S%G4729><s%> we are perplexed, <S%G639><s%> but not in despair; <S%G1820><s%>
Persecuted, <S%G1377><s%> but not forsaken; <S%G1459><s%> cast <S%G2598><s%> down, <S%G2598><s%> but not destroyed; <S%G622><s%>

Always <S%G3842><s%> bearing <S%G4064><s%> about <S%G4064><s%> in the body <S%G4983><s%> the dying <S%G3500><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> that the life <S%G2222><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> might be made <S%G5319><s%> manifest <S%G5319><s%> in our body. <S%G4983><s%>

For we which <S%G3588><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> are always <S%G104><s%> delivered <S%G3860><s%> to death <S%G2288><s%> for Jesus' <S%G2424><s%> sake, that the life <S%G2222><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> might be made <S%G5319><s%> manifest <S%G5319><s%> in our mortal <S%G2349><s%> flesh. <S%G4561><s%>
So <S%G5620><s%> then <S%G3303><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> works <S%G1754><s%> in us, but life <S%G2222><s%> in you.

We having <S%G2192><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%> of faith, <S%G4102><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> as it is written, <S%G1125><s%> I believed, <S%G4100><s%> and therefore <S%G1352><s%> have I spoken; <S%G2980><s%> we also <S%G2532><s%> believe, <S%G4100><s%> and therefore <S%G1352><s%> speak; <S%G2980><s%>

Knowing <S%G1492><s%> that he which raised <S%G1453><s%> up the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> shall raise <S%G1453><s%> up us also <S%G2532><s%> by Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> and shall present <S%G3936><s%> us with you.

For all <S%G3956><s%> things are for your <S%G5209><s%> sakes, that the abundant <S%G4121><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> might through <S%G1223><s%> the thanksgiving <S%G2169><s%> of many <S%G4119><s%> redound <S%G4052><s%> to the glory <S%G1391><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For which <S%G1352><s%> cause <S%G1352><s%> we faint <S%G1573><s%> not; but though <S%G1499><s%> our outward <S%G1854><s%> man <S%G444><s%> perish, <S%G1311><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> the inward <S%G2081><s%> man is renewed <S%G341><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> by day. <S%G2250><s%>

For our light <S%G1645><s%> affliction, <S%G2347><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is but for a moment, <S%G3901><s%> works <S%G2716><s%> for us a far <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5236><s%> more <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5236><s%> exceeding <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5236><s%> and eternal <S%G166><s%> weight <S%G922><s%> of glory; <S%G1391><s%>

While we look <S%G4648><s%> not at <S%G4648><s%> the things which are seen, <S%G991><s%> but at <S%G4648><s%> the things which are not seen: <S%G991><s%> for the things which are seen <S%G991><s%> are temporal; <S%G4340><s%> but the things which are not seen <S%G991><s%> are eternal. <S%G166><s%>
